cfg                81 data/lua/wml/items.lua 	if cfg.write_name then wesnoth.set_variable(write_name, cfg.name) end

cfg                 4 data/lua/wml/modify_ai.lua function wesnoth.wml_actions.modify_ai(cfg)

cfg                 7 data/lua/wml/modify_ai.lua 	if cfg.action == "add" or cfg.action == "change" then
cfg                 8 data/lua/wml/modify_ai.lua 		local start = string.find(cfg.path, "[a-z_]+%[[a-z0-9_*]*%]$")
cfg                 9 data/lua/wml/modify_ai.lua 		final = start and (string.find(cfg.path, '[', start, true) - 1) or -1
cfg                10 data/lua/wml/modify_ai.lua 		start = start or string.find(cfg.path, "[^.]*$") or 1
cfg                11 data/lua/wml/modify_ai.lua 		local comp_type = string.sub(cfg.path, start, final)
cfg                12 data/lua/wml/modify_ai.lua 		component = helper.get_child(cfg, comp_type)
cfg                19 data/lua/wml/modify_ai.lua 		if cfg.action == "add" then
cfg                20 data/lua/wml/modify_ai.lua 			wesnoth.add_ai_component(sides[i].side, cfg.path, component)
cfg                21 data/lua/wml/modify_ai.lua 		elseif cfg.action == "delete" or cfg.action == "try_delete" then
cfg                22 data/lua/wml/modify_ai.lua 			wesnoth.delete_ai_component(sides[i].side, cfg.path)
cfg                23 data/lua/wml/modify_ai.lua 		elseif cfg.action == "change" then

cfg                32 data/lua/wml/modify_ai.lua 			wesnoth.change_ai_component(sides[i].side, cfg.path, component)
